means: [地名] [西班牙、意大利] 格拉多

sentence.Network_en: All Grado headphones have a vented diaphragm design that incorporates a large air chamber.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有歌德耳机有一个发泄隔膜设计,采用了大型气室.

sentence.Network_en: Each headphone driver is made to Grado's high standards, then pair - matched for exact imaging.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个耳机驱动器是为歌德的高标准, 然后配对的准确成像.

sentence.Network_en: Company founder , Joseph Grado is credited as the inventor of the stereo moving coil phono cartridge.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司创始人约瑟夫格拉多记入的发明者动圈式立体声唱机墨盒.
